.. _`sleuth_prep`:

SLEUTH_PREP
===========

Import kallisto/salmon counts in Sleuth






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_sleuth_prep:
        input:
            target_mapping = "target.tsv",
            meta = "meta.tsv"
        output:
            "sleuth_prep.rds"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed/bio/sleuth/prep"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris
